definition: Perm, Russian city in the Urals
woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor

sentences.english: Many million years ago the territory of the present Perm region was occupied by the Perm Sea.
sentences.chinese: 現在的彼爾姆地區在數百萬年前還屬於彼爾姆海。

sentences.english: Many million years ago the territory of the present Perm region was occupied by the Perm Sea.
sentences.chinese: 現在的彼爾姆地區在數百萬年前還屬於彼爾姆海。

sentences.english: A fragment of an extraterrestrial spaceship has been found in Russia's Perm region.
sentences.chinese: 一塊外星飛船碎片已在俄羅斯斯彼爾姆地區被發現。
